synthesis_conditions.washing_method: centrifuged, supernatant replaced by fresh dry DMF four times, soaked in dry dichloromethane for 2 days
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: activated under vacuum at room temperature for 8 h then at 130 °C overnight
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: stable under inert atmosphere, at low relative humidity (RH ≤ 30%) stable for several hours

synthesis_conditions.equipment: sonicated for 1 min, heated at 120 °C for 22 h
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered, washed with DMF (100 ml) and methanol (100 ml)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: activated in high vacuum, first at room temperature, then at 140 °C overnight
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: formic acid acted as modulator to control crystal nucleation and growth
